appendix.title: Thanks
appendix.para: The GNOMEs who bring you this software are too numerous to mention by name, but in addition to the folks mentioned above, a few contributors deserve special thanks for exceptional contributions toward making this release possible:

listitem.para: Mike Newman for his work on the zenity gdialog wrapper
Bill Haneman and Calumn Benson for Keyboard Accessibility Status applet
Irene Ryan, Eugene O'Connor and Pat Costello for documentation work throughout GNOME
Malcolm Tredinnick for settings for "dont-proxy-for-this-domain" in gnome-vfs
Anders Carlsson - Convert file attributes from stringlists to bitmasks in Nautilus
Glynn Foster - Nicer Nautilus bookmarks dialog
Marco Pesenti Gritti - icon theme throbber support in Nautilus
Jürg Billeter and Wolfgang Pichler - worked on the multiroot tree sidebar
Soren Sandmann - high-performance model for the Nautilus listview
Johan Dahlin - file size and count for the Nautilus multi-file property dialog
Bastien Nocera for use of the new samba library for smb support in gnome-vfs-extras
Bastien Nocera for DVD burning and other goodness in nautilus-cd-burner
Ross Burton for write to cd context menu, bugfixes in nautilus-cd-burner
Bob Doan for cdrw blanking support in nautilus-cd-burner
